title: How to Refresh a High Top Fade | Axe | Instagroom
description:
This is how Sorrell keeps his blonde high top fade fresher than fresh.

THE TOOLS:
Axe Signature Clean Cut Look Classic Pomade 
Hair pick

THE STEPS:
1. Take an afro pick
2. Pick out knotted hair
3. Scoop a finger of pomade
4. Scrunch into hair
5. Fluff the crown

Subscribe to the Axe channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: It’s an interesting thing to have on the top of my head. Get my afro comb, pick out the few bits that look a little bit knotted. I scoop out a fingers worth of pomade and I just scrunch it into my head. Then I fluff up the crown, I kinda do enjoy having it FRESH!
